import {useState} from 'react' const Addproduct = () => { const [tittle, settittle] = useState(''); const [price, setprice] = useState(0); const saveproduct = async (e) => {e.preventDefault(); const product = {tittle, price}; await fetch('http://localhost:8080/kamar',{method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(pro) }) } return (
settittle(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Title" />
setprice(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Price" />
) } export default Addproduct
